title: League of Lag
body: Hey guys let me start out with saying I am NOT a computer wiz at all. So I bought a gaming pc this year from ibuypower and being in my parents home I'm upstairs while the router is downstairs and I am experiencing lag on pc games where my xbox works just fine in the same location. I am on wifi with my pc so I'm unsure if it's just a shit wifi adapter in the pc or what. I of course would love to just be wired right into the router but that's not a very viable option. So I'm curious if you think a wifi range extender would be good (and if so if anyone has any recommendations:)). Or any other ideas for me. Thank you for any help!

replies.body: It's not entirely unlikely that your network is working really well, but just has a hard time reaching out servers specifically. Let's double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) before you run out and buy an extender. If that doesn't seem to help much, hit me back up and we can try a couple other troubleshooting steps.
I checked as many of the things I could in the network settings and nothing seemed to improve :(

PC requires more internet than a console/ Also the console might have a stronger WiFi antenna than the PC. I recommend getting a 50ft ethernet cable and wiring it up. If your family doesn't mind feeding it through the downstairs ceiling of course. If not just get a strong USB WiFi adapter. Also make sure devices connected to the WiFi are limited. WiFi becomes unstable with multiple devices using it and results in WAY slower speeds
